issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: Is not a bug in our product
resolution.name: Not Our Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Performance analytics in dashboard are not showing crashes.  Sometimes they show up on the release console page, sometimes not.  Even after waiting an hour, the crashes do not appear.  I am attaching a zip file with the AppC project.  This project uses a module created by Leor Brenman that causes crashes and exceptions.  We have been using this module for years to generate crashes.

source code is here:  https://eu.syncplicity.com/share/hiahrrrnnrh87d3/RWTestCrash2
fields.summary: Crashes are not being picked up by crittercism/appteligent

comments.body: There was a delay for about 12+ hours to see the crashes in this instance. For now closing as an Apteligent issue
